issue_summary: iPhone 15 Pro - Stuck in "SOS Only" mode in 5G coverage area.
issue_description: Customer reported: Stuck in "SOS Only" mode in 5G coverage area.. Device: iPhone 15 Pro. Investigation revealed network settings.
resolution: Reset Network Settings; Toggle Airplane Mode; Replace eSIM.

issue_summary: iPhone 16 Plus - Stuck in "SOS Only" mode (Intermittent).
issue_description: Customer reported: Stuck in "SOS Only" mode (Intermittent).. Device: iPhone 16 Plus. Investigation revealed software bug.
resolution: Update to iOS 18.2; Disable "Satellite" features in settings.

issue_summary: Samsung S24 Ultra - Rapid toggling between 5G and LTE (Battery drain).
issue_description: Customer reported: Rapid toggling between 5G and LTE (Battery drain).. Device: Samsung S24 Ultra. Investigation revealed network configuration.
resolution: Set Network Mode to "LTE Only" or "5G On" (disable Auto).

issue_summary: Google Pixel 9 - "Modem unavailable" error after software update.
issue_description: Customer reported: "Modem unavailable" error after software update.. Device: Google Pixel 9. Investigation revealed software bug.
resolution: Clear "Carrier Services" app cache; Hard Reboot.

issue_summary: iPhone 14 - 5G UW icon shows but data speed is < 1 Mbps.
issue_description: Customer reported: 5G UW icon shows but data speed is < 1 Mbps.. Device: iPhone 14. Investigation revealed network settings.
resolution: Reset Network Settings; Toggle "5G Standalone" Off.

issue_summary: Samsung S23 - Dropped calls when switching from Wi-Fi to Cellula...
issue_description: Customer reported: Dropped calls when switching from Wi-Fi to Cellular.. Device: Samsung S23. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Disable "Wi-Fi Calling" or "Intelligent Wi-Fi" switch.

issue_summary: iPhone 13 Mini - Overheating during 5G Facetime calls.
issue_description: Customer reported: Overheating during 5G Facetime calls.. Device: iPhone 13 Mini. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Switch Data Mode to "Low Data Mode" to throttle heat.

issue_summary: Motorola Edge+ - Visual Voicemail app crashes on launch.
issue_description: Customer reported: Visual Voicemail app crashes on launch.. Device: Motorola Edge+. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Uninstall updates to "VVM" app; Clear App Data.

issue_summary: iPad Pro (M4) - "No Service" on Data-only plan.
issue_description: Customer reported: "No Service" on Data-only plan.. Device: iPad Pro (M4). Investigation revealed esim provisioning issue.
resolution: Reprovision IMEI in billing system; Reset APN settings.

issue_summary: Apple Watch Ultra 2 - NumberShare failing to ring on incoming call.
issue_description: Customer reported: NumberShare failing to ring on incoming call.. Device: Apple Watch Ultra 2. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Unpair/Re-pair Watch; "Remove Cellular Plan" and re-add.

issue_summary: Galaxy Watch 7 - "Emergency Calls Only" despite active plan.
issue_description: Customer reported: "Emergency Calls Only" despite active plan.. Device: Galaxy Watch 7. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Enable "VoLTE Roaming" on Watch settings; Sync with Phone.

issue_summary: iPhone SE (3rd Gen) - Failed to receive SMS 2FA codes (Bank/Uber).
issue_description: Customer reported: Failed to receive SMS 2FA codes (Bank/Uber).. Device: iPhone SE (3rd Gen). Investigation revealed hardware failure.
resolution: Whitelist Short Codes (225-999); Call VZ to sync SMS Gateway.

issue_description: Customer reported: RCS Chat "Status: Connecting" indefinitely.. Device: Pixel 8a. Investigation revealed cache corruption.
resolution: Turn off RCS; Airplane Mode ON; Clear Msgs Cache; Turn RCS ON.

issue_description: Customer reported: "Call Failed" immediately upon dialing.. Device: iPhone 15. Investigation revealed network configuration.
resolution: Update Carrier Settings (About > General); Dial *73 to disable forwarding.

issue_summary: Galaxy Z Flip 6 - Screen flickers when switching 5G bands.
issue_description: Customer reported: Screen flickers when switching 5G bands.. Device: Galaxy Z Flip 6. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Disable "Motion Smoothness" (Hardware bug); wait for OneUI patch.

issue_summary: Kyocera DuraForce - Push-to-Talk (PTT) Plus app login failure.
issue_description: Customer reported: Push-to-Talk (PTT) Plus app login failure.. Device: Kyocera DuraForce. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Remove "Business Productivity" SOC code and re-add.

issue_summary: Orbic Speed 5G - Hotspot disconnects every 15 minutes.
issue_description: Customer reported: Hotspot disconnects every 15 minutes.. Device: Orbic Speed 5G. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Change "Sleep Settings" in Web Admin (192.168.1.1) to "Never".

issue_summary: Inseego MiFi X Pro - "SIM Invalid" error after firmware update.
issue_description: Customer reported: "SIM Invalid" error after firmware update.. Device: Inseego MiFi X Pro. Investigation revealed modem firmware issue.
resolution: Factory Reset device (Pin hole); Replace Physical SIM.

issue_summary: iPhone 12 - Cannot send photos (MMS) over Wi-Fi Calling.
issue_description: Customer reported: Cannot send photos (MMS) over Wi-Fi Calling.. Device: iPhone 12. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Enable "Send as SMS" fallback; turn off Wi-Fi Calling for MMS.

issue_summary: Samsung A54 - GPS drifting while on 5G UW network.
issue_description: Customer reported: GPS drifting while on 5G UW network.. Device: Samsung A54. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Disable "Google Location Accuracy" (High Accuracy) momentarily.

issue_summary: CR1000A Router - Solid Yellow Light (No Internet) - Morning.
issue_description: Customer reported: Solid Yellow Light (No Internet) - Morning.. Device: CR1000A Router. Investigation revealed ip lease issue.
resolution: Power Cycle ONT; Release/Renew WAN IP lease.

issue_summary: CR1000B Router - Solid Yellow Light (No Internet) - Evening.
issue_description: Customer reported: Solid Yellow Light (No Internet) - Evening.. Device: CR1000B Router. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Disable IPv6 in Router Admin (Intel NIC compatibility bug).

issue_summary: G3100 Router - "DFS Channel" switching drops 5GHz Wi-Fi.
issue_description: Customer reported: "DFS Channel" switching drops 5GHz Wi-Fi.. Device: G3100 Router. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Manually set 5GHz channel to 149 or 157 (Non-DFS).

issue_summary: E3200 Extender - "Coax Link" light off (MoCA failure).
issue_description: Customer reported: "Coax Link" light off (MoCA failure).. Device: E3200 Extender. Investigation revealed splitter issue.
resolution: Check splitters (Must be 1675MHz); Reseat Coax cable.

issue_summary: Fios TV One - Remote Voice Command "Network Error".
issue_description: Customer reported: Remote Voice Command "Network Error".. Device: Fios TV One. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Re-pair remote (Play/Pause + 0); Reboot STB.

issue_summary: Fios TV Mini - "Box not found" error on multi-room DVR.
issue_description: Customer reported: "Box not found" error on multi-room DVR.. Device: Fios TV Mini. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Check "IGMP Snooping" enabled on router; Ensure same subnet.

issue_description: Customer reported: "Fail" Light Red (Loss of Signal).. Device: ONT (Alcatel). Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Technician dispatch required (Fiber cut/bend).

issue_description: Customer reported: "Vid" Light Red (No TV Signal).. Device: ONT (Nokia). Investigation revealed splitter issue.
resolution: Check RF Coax output on ONT; Replace Coax tip.

issue_summary: Battery Backup - Beeping every 15 mins (Battery Dead).
issue_description: Customer reported: Beeping every 15 mins (Battery Dead).. Device: Battery Backup. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Remove 12V Battery; Press "Alarm Silence" (Blue Button).

issue_summary: VMS4100 DVR - Recordings deleting early (90% full).
issue_description: Customer reported: Recordings deleting early (90% full).. Device: VMS4100 DVR. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Change "Keep Until" setting to "I delete"; Upgrade DVR storage.

issue_summary: Streaming - "User Not Authorized" on ESPN app.
issue_description: Customer reported: "User Not Authorized" on ESPN app.. Device: Streaming. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Unlink/Relink Provider in App Settings; Reset VZ Password.

issue_summary: Installation - Buried drop wire cut by landscaper.
issue_description: Customer reported: Buried drop wire cut by landscaper.. Device: Installation. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Call 811 (Dig Safe); Schedule "Temporary Drop" dispatch.

issue_description: Customer reported: 1 Gig plan showing 100 Mbps (Cap).. Device: Speed. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Check Ethernet Cable (Cat5e/Cat6); Check NIC Duplex settings.

issue_summary: Latency - High ping (100ms+) on Local server.
issue_description: Customer reported: High ping (100ms+) on Local server.. Device: Latency. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Trace-route to check hops; Disable IPv6; Factory Reset Router.

issue_description: Customer reported: Smart Plugs (2.4GHz) won't connect.. Device: Wi-Fi. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Disable SON (Self-Organizing Network); Separate 2.4/5GHz SSIDs.

issue_description: Customer reported: Red Blinking Light (No Signal).. Device: Gateway (ASK-NCQ). Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Rotate device 90 degrees; Move to different window.

issue_description: Customer reported: Red Blinking Light (Overheating).. Device: Gateway (ARC-XCI). Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Unplug for 10m; Add external fan; Keep out of direct sun.

issue_description: Customer reported: "Geo-Fence" Lock (Moved Address).. Device: Gateway (LVSKIHP). Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Call Support to update "Service Address" GPS coordinates.

issue_summary: Gaming - NAT Type 3 (Strict) - Voice Chat Blocked.
issue_description: Customer reported: NAT Type 3 (Strict) - Voice Chat Blocked.. Device: Gaming. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Enable UPnP; Use DMZ for Console IP (Security Risk).

issue_description: Customer reported: 4K Video Buffering (Throttled).. Device: Streaming. Investigation revealed hardware failure.
resolution: VPN usage (sometimes bypasses video shaper); Reboot Gateway.

issue_summary: Connection - Dropping connection at 5 PM daily.
issue_description: Customer reported: Dropping connection at 5 PM daily.. Device: Connection. Investigation revealed tower congestion.
resolution: Tower congestion; nothing user can do (Network Management).

issue_description: Customer reported: "One Verizon ID" login loop.. Device: Account. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Use Incognito Window; Unlink Fios/Wireless accounts.

issue_summary: Account - Cannot view PDF Bill (White Screen).
issue_description: Customer reported: Cannot view PDF Bill (White Screen).. Device: Account. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Disable Ad-blocker; Try My Verizon App instead of Desktop.

issue_description: Customer reported: Missing $800 Trade-in Credit (iPhone 15).. Device: Promo. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: File PCA (Promo Correction); Provide Submission ID.

issue_description: Customer reported: Missing $1000 Trade-in Credit (Galaxy S24).. Device: Promo. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: File PCA; Verify "Premium" plan requirement met.

issue_description: Customer reported: Missing $200 Switcher Rebate (Gift Card).. Device: Promo. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Check "Digital Reward Center"; Resubmit receipt image.

issue_description: Customer reported: "Legacy Plan Adjustment" ($4/mo).. Device: Fee. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Change plan to "Unlimited Welcome" or "Plus".

issue_description: Customer reported: "Economic Adjustment Charge" ($2.98).. Device: Fee. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Mandatory fee on Business accounts; cannot remove.

issue_description: Customer reported: $10 Autopay Discount Removed.. Device: Discount. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Re-add Debit Card or VZ Visa (Credit Cards ineligible).

issue_description: Customer reported: Nurse/Teacher Discount Dropped.. Device: Discount. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Re-verify via ID.me or SheerID portal; waits 1-2 cycles.

issue_description: Customer reported: Mobile + Home Level 3 ($10) Missing.. Device: Discount. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Ensure both accounts have same "Last Name" and "Billing Address".

issue_description: Customer reported: "Data Usage" Meter shows 0 GB.. Device: Usage. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: App Glitch; check usage via #DATA (#3282) dialer code.

issue_description: Customer reported: "Subscription Expired" error.. Device: Disney+. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Activate via "Services & Perks" in App; Re-login Disney+.

issue_summary: Apple Music - "Contact Carrier" error on launch.
issue_description: Customer reported: "Contact Carrier" error on launch.. Device: Apple Music. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Toggle "Apple Music" OFF/ON in "Add-ons"; Re-link Apple ID.

issue_description: Customer reported: Charged for Non-Returned Device (Sent).. Device: Return. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Provide UPS Drop-off Receipt; Open "Warehouse Research" tkt.

issue_description: Customer reported: Double Activation Fee ($70).. Device: Activation. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Credit Request; explain "System Error" during online checkout.

issue_description: Customer reported: "Pending Order" prevents upgrade.. Device: Cart. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Call Sales Support to "Kill" the ghost order in OMNI system.

issue_description: Customer reported: "In-Store Pickup" cancelled by system.. Device: Store. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Inventory mismatch; Order must be re-placed for shipping.

issue_description: Customer reported: Bot loops "I don't understand".. Device: Chat. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Type "Agent" 3 times; Select "Tech Support" not "Billing".

issue_description: Customer reported: "Wait time 5 min" -> 1 hour hold.. Device: Phone. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Schedule "Call Back" via App; Call 8 AM EST sharp.

issue_description: Customer reported: Rep refused return (Franchise Store).. Device: Store. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Verify if "Authorized Retailer" (Victra/TCC); Go to Corp Store.

issue_summary: App - App crashes on iOS 18 Beta.
issue_description: Customer reported: App crashes on iOS 18 Beta.. Device: App. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Wait for App Store update; Use Mobile Web (https://www.google.com/search?q=m.verizon.com).

issue_description: Customer reported: eSIM "Unable to Activate".. Device: iPhone 15 Pro. Investigation revealed esim provisioning issue.
resolution: Connect to Wi-Fi; Scan QR code provided by Chat Support.

issue_description: Customer reported: "Not Registered on Network".. Device: Galaxy S23 Ultra. Investigation revealed network settings.

issue_summary: Pixel 7 Pro - Dropped calls in elevator.
issue_description: Customer reported: Dropped calls in elevator.. Device: Pixel 7 Pro. Investigation revealed configuration error.

issue_description: Customer reported: CarPlay disconnects near 5G towers.. Device: iPhone 14 Plus. Investigation revealed tower congestion.

issue_description: Customer reported: Cannot enable Hotspot (Authentication).. Device: Moto G Stylus. Investigation revealed authentication failure.
resolution: Check Plan features (Starter Unlimited has no hotspot).

issue_description: Customer reported: Solid Yellow Light (Too far).. Device: Extender. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Move Extender closer to Router (White light = Good).

issue_description: Customer reported: "Error VMS_1067" (Stream limit).. Device: VOD. Investigation revealed configuration error.

issue_description: Customer reported: Tech didn't install Ethernet in walls.. Device: Install. Investigation revealed configuration error.

resolution: Power cycle STB.

issue_description: Customer reported: Channel logos missing.. Device: Guide. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Auto-correct STB via Menu.

issue_summary: On Demand - Rental purchased by accident.
issue_description: Customer reported: Rental purchased by accident.. Device: On Demand. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Call Billing; One-time courtesy credit.

issue_description: Customer reported: Router fan failed (Red Light).. Device: Hardware. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Replace Router immediately (Overheat risk).

issue_summary: Wireless - SOS Mode Loop (Stuck on SOS)
issue_description: Customer reported: SOS Mode Loop (Stuck on SOS). Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed network settings.
resolution: Reset Network Settings; Toggle Airplane Mode (15s); Re-provision eSIM or replace physical SIM card.

issue_description: Customer reported: 5G/4G Rapid Toggling (Battery Drain). Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed network configuration.
resolution: Switch Cellular Data Options to "5G Auto" or "LTE Only" to stop hunting for weak 5G signals.

issue_description: Customer reported: False 5G UW Icon (Slow Speeds). Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed network configuration.
resolution: Reset carrier settings; Check for local tower congestion; Re-latch to network via Power Cycle.

issue_description: Customer reported: eSIM "Activating" Hang (24hr+). Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed esim provisioning issue.
resolution: Delete stalled eSIM; Request "Push" activation via QR code from Tier 2 technical support.

issue_description: Customer reported: Visual Voicemail Sync Lag. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed network configuration.
resolution: Toggle "Cellular Data" off/on; Update Carrier Settings (General > About); Reset VVM via dialer (*86).

issue_description: Customer reported: SMS/MMS 2FA codes not arriving. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Check "Blocked" numbers; Contact support to "Sync Messaging Profile" on account back-end.

issue_description: Customer reported: Wi-Fi Calling Hand-off Drops. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Disable "Wi-Fi Assist" (iOS) or "Adaptive Wi-Fi" (Android) to prevent premature switching.

issue_description: Customer reported: Deprioritization Stalls on Unlimited. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Upgrade to "Premium" data tier (Welcome -> Plus) to regain QCI-8 (High Priority) network status.

issue_summary: Wireless - Network Extender GPS Lock Failure
issue_description: Customer reported: Network Extender GPS Lock Failure. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Place GPS antenna near window; Open UDP Ports 123, 500, and 4500 on home router firewall.

issue_description: Customer reported: International TravelPass No Data. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Manually select a local carrier in "Network Selection" settings instead of "Automatic."

issue_description: Customer reported: CR1000 "Yellow Light" (No Internet). Category: Fios. Investigation revealed ip lease issue.
resolution: Power cycle ONT first, then Router; check for IP lease exhaustion in router admin (192.168.1.1).

issue_description: Customer reported: IPv6 Latency/Lag (Intel NICs). Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Access router settings and Disable IPv6; force network to use IPv4 only for stable pings.

issue_description: Customer reported: ONT "Red Fail" Light. Category: Fios. Investigation revealed hardware failure.
resolution: Reseat fiber optic cable; if persistent, ONT requires hardware replacement due to "Low Light" signal.

issue_description: Customer reported: 5G Home Gateway Overheating. Category: Home Int.. Investigation revealed hardware failure.
resolution: Move unit away from direct sunlight; ensure bottom vents are not blocked by carpet or clutter.

issue_description: Customer reported: Gateway "Geo-Fence" Error. Category: Home Int.. Investigation revealed hardware failure.
resolution: Contact support to "Refresh Location" if moving unit within the same home triggered a lock.

issue_description: Customer reported: Missing Trade-In Credits. Category: Billing. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Request a "PCA" (Promotion Correction Action) form; requires IMEI of old device and tracking #.

issue_description: Customer reported: Autopay Discount Loss ($10). Category: Billing. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Re-link a Debit Card or Verizon Visa; Credit Cards (non-VZ) are now ineligible for discount.

issue_description: Customer reported: "Legacy" Surcharge ($4/line). Category: Billing. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Move to a "myPlan" (Welcome/Plus/Ultimate) tier; legacy plans are being phased out via fees.

issue_summary: Billing - One Verizon ID Login Loop
issue_description: Customer reported: One Verizon ID Login Loop. Category: Billing. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: De-register the Fios ID and Wireless ID; re-register using a single, non-shared email address.

issue_summary: Support - Rep Promised Discount Not Applied
issue_description: Customer reported: Rep Promised Discount Not Applied. Category: Support. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Reference the "Interaction ID" or Chat Transcript; file a "Notice of Dispute" for credit back-dating.

issue_summary: Wireless - Calls going straight to Voicemail
issue_description: Customer reported: Calls going straight to Voicemail. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed network settings.
resolution: Disable "Silence Unknown Callers"; Reset Network Settings to clear stale HLR (Home Location Register).

issue_description: Customer reported: "Potential Spam" Caller ID (Outgoing). Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Register number with "Free Caller Registry" (standard for major carriers) to clear reputation.

issue_description: Customer reported: Mismatched Coverage Maps. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed tower congestion.
resolution: Install "Cell Mapper" to verify local towers; submit "Network Inquiry" ticket via the My Verizon app.

issue_description: Customer reported: Carrier Settings Update Loop. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed network configuration.
resolution: Connect to iTunes/Finder; sync device to force-push latest .ipcc carrier bundle files.

issue_description: Customer reported: 5G UW signal "Shadowing" (Leaves/Trees). Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Use "C-Band" (Mid-band) instead of mmWave; move closer to a window with line-of-sight to the small cell.

issue_description: Customer reported: Wi-Fi SON Conflict (2.4GHz devices). Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Disable "Self-Organizing Network" in Fios settings; create separate SSIDs for 2.4GHz and 5GHz.

issue_description: Customer reported: Bufferbloat on 500Mbps+ plans. Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Enable "SQM" or "Quality of Service" (QoS) on a 3rd party router (Bridge Mode) to manage traffic.

issue_description: Customer reported: Cloud DVR "Recording Error". Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Perform "STB Auto-Correction" via the Help menu on the Fios TV remote.

issue_description: Customer reported: Remote won't control Volume. Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Re-pair via "Bluetooth/Voice Remote" settings; use code search for specific Soundbar/TV brands.

issue_summary: Home Int. - High Jitter for Gaming
issue_description: Customer reported: High Jitter for Gaming. Category: Home Int.. Investigation revealed hardware failure.
resolution: Use Ethernet instead of Wi-Fi; check "NAT Type" (aim for Type 2/Open) in gateway settings.

issue_summary: Wireless - SIM Card "Not Valid" after 1 year
issue_description: Customer reported: SIM Card "Not Valid" after 1 year. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed esim provisioning issue.
resolution: Physical SIM wear-and-tear; migrate to eSIM via My Verizon app for digital stability.

issue_description: Customer reported: "No Service" after Software Update. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed software bug.
resolution: Perform "Hard Reboot" (Vol Up, Vol Down, Hold Power); check for Day-1 patch from Apple/Samsung.

issue_description: Customer reported: VoLTE Hissing/Static. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Disable "HD Voice" temporarily if the other party is on a non-interoperable carrier (e.g., VoIP lines).

issue_description: Customer reported: Port-In Stuck (from MVNO). Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Verify "Port Pin" and "Account Number" with previous carrier; manual release required by VZ Port Center.

issue_description: Customer reported: 480p Video Cap on 5G. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Enable "Maximum Data Throughput" or "4K Streaming" toggle in My Verizon Plan Add-ons.

issue_summary: Fios - Ethernet Port Failure on Router
issue_description: Customer reported: Ethernet Port Failure on Router. Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Test with different Cat6 cable; if no link light, request router replacement (RMA).

issue_description: Customer reported: Hidden SSID still visible. Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Disable "WPS" and "SSID Broadcast"; some beacons are required for Fios TV boxes to function.

issue_description: Customer reported: ONT Battery Beeping. Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Replace 12V 7Ah lead-acid battery; or unplug BBU if Fios is Data-only (No Phone).

issue_description: Customer reported: Disney+ Bundle "Double Charge". Category: Billing. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Ensure the email used for Disney+ matches the Verizon primary account email exactly.

issue_description: Customer reported: "Pending Order" Blocking Changes. Category: Billing. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Call "Core" support to "Kill" the stuck order in the ACSS/OMNI billing system.

issue_description: Customer reported: (Expansion of previous 50). Category: Various. Investigation revealed cache corruption.
resolution: Resolutions include: RMA hardware, clearing cache, re-syncing network profiles, and back-end credits.

issue_description: Customer reported: Static IP Setup Errors. Category: Business. Investigation revealed hardware failure.
resolution: Manual configuration of Gateway into "IP Passthrough" mode; requires Level 3 Tech support.

issue_description: Customer reported: Technical "Black Hole" Tickets. Category: Support. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Escalation to "Executive Relations" via the corporate "Contact Us" feedback form.

issue_description: Customer reported: Satellite SOS Mode Interference. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Disable "Satellite Connection" in settings when in urban areas with high RF noise.

issue_summary: Wireless - RCS Messaging failing on Samsung
issue_description: Customer reported: RCS Messaging failing on Samsung. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed cache corruption.
resolution: Update "Carrier Services" app from Play Store; Clear cache of Google Messages app.

issue_description: Customer reported: Dual-SIM "No Data" on Line 2. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Check "Data Switching" toggle; ensure APN settings for line 2 are correctly populated.

issue_description: Customer reported: Hotspot Disconnecting after 10m. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Change "Hotspot Timeout" to "Never" in device advanced connection settings.

issue_description: Customer reported: Number Share (Watch) sync failure. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Re-pair via Wearable App; "Remove and Re-add" cellular plan on Apple/Galaxy Watch.

issue_description: Customer reported: Call Dropping on "Handover". Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Update PRL (Preferred Roaming List) by dialing *228 (Legacy) or power cycling.

issue_description: Customer reported: Voicemail "Greeting" Not Saving. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Record greeting via phone dialer rather than the app; sync with server by calling your own #.

issue_description: Customer reported: LTE Extender "No IP". Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Assign a Static IP to the Extender's MAC address in your routerâs DHCP settings.

issue_description: Customer reported: Mismatched Caller ID (Name). Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Update "Share Name ID" in the My Verizon app under Line Settings.

issue_summary: Wireless - App Store/Play Store slow on 5G
issue_description: Customer reported: App Store/Play Store slow on 5G. Category: Wireless. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Disable "Data Saver" mode; check for specific VZW "Video Optimizer" throttling.

issue_description: Customer reported: "MoCA" Link Light off. Category: Fios. Investigation revealed splitter issue.
resolution: Check coax splitters; ensure they are 5-1675MHz rated for Fios MoCA 2.0/2.5.

issue_description: Customer reported: TV Guide "No Data". Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Unplug STB for 30s; force re-download of OOB (Out-of-Band) data from the ONT.

issue_description: Customer reported: ONT Overheating in Attic. Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Move ONT to a climate-controlled room or add an active cooling fan to the enclosure.

issue_description: Customer reported: Low Upload on 1G Plan. Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Replace old Cat5e cables with Cat6; check for "Half-Duplex" errors on the NIC.

issue_description: Customer reported: Multi-Room DVR "Box Not Found". Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Ensure all boxes are on the same subnet (192.168.1.x) and "IGMP Snooping" is on.

issue_description: Customer reported: Remote Voice Search "Network Error". Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Reset the Fios TV One box; re-authenticate the Verizon ID via the on-screen menu.

issue_description: Customer reported: Fiber Micro-bend (Slow Data). Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Technician must re-splice the fiber end or replace the jumper cable from the wall.

issue_description: Customer reported: ONT "Video" Light Red. Category: Fios. Investigation revealed splitter issue.
resolution: Check coax connection; if data works, the "RF Video" signal from the ONT is failing.

issue_description: Customer reported: 2Gbps Plan speed not reaching. Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Requires 2.5GbE/10GbE Network Card and Router; standard Gigabit ports will cap at 940Mbps.

issue_description: Customer reported: Guest Wi-Fi No Internet. Category: Fios. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Check "VLAN Isolation" settings; ensure Guest SSID is not conflicting with IoT SSID.

issue_description: Customer reported: Signal Jitter/Gateway Bugs. Category: Home Int.. Investigation revealed hardware failure.
resolution: Resolutions: Factory Reset Gateway, repositioning near window, using external 4x4 MIMO antennas.

issue_description: Customer reported: Promotion/Rebate Denials. Category: Billing. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Resolutions: Manual submission by Store Manager, filing "PCA" for back-dated credit.

issue_description: Customer reported: My Verizon App/Portal Glitches. Category: Digital. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Resolutions: Clear browser cookies, use Incognito mode, or "Unlink" Fios/Wireless IDs.

issue_description: Customer reported: Distinct Issue. Category: Category. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Technical Resolution / Action Taken

issue_summary: 5G Infrastructure - C-Band Handover Jitter: High latency when switching between ...
issue_description: Customer reported: C-Band Handover Jitter: High latency when switching between 5G Nationwide and 5G Ultra Wideband.. Category: 5G Infrastructure. Investigation revealed tower congestion.
resolution: Res.: Network engineers must perform a "Site Reset" on the specific sector; user can toggle "5G On" instead of "5G Auto" to force stability.

issue_summary: 5G Infrastructure - Standalone (SA) Modem Lock: Phones refusing to latch onto th...
issue_description: Customer reported: Standalone (SA) Modem Lock: Phones refusing to latch onto the newer 5G Standalone core, resulting in slower "Non-Standalone" speeds.. Category: 5G Infrastructure. Investigation revealed software bug.
resolution: Res.: Update to the latest OS-level carrier bundle (e.g., VZW 58.0+); requires back-end "Feature Add" for 5G SA on the line profile.

issue_summary: Fios Hardware - MoCA 2.5 Backhaul Failure: Wi-Fi extenders losing the wired ...
issue_description: Customer reported: MoCA 2.5 Backhaul Failure: Wi-Fi extenders losing the wired coax backbone, dropping to slow Wi-Fi repeating.. Category: Fios Hardware. Investigation revealed splitter issue.
resolution: Res.: Replace coax splitters with 1675MHz-rated units; ensure MoCA Privacy is disabled on the primary router if using 3rd party extenders.

issue_summary: Fios Hardware - ONT "Optical Loop" Timeout: Fiber connection drops every 24 ...
issue_description: Customer reported: ONT "Optical Loop" Timeout: Fiber connection drops every 24 hours exactly due to IP lease renewal failure.. Category: Fios Hardware. Investigation revealed hardware failure.
resolution: Res.: Technical support must "Break the Lease" manually; ONT hardware replacement required if the "Data" light remains off after reboot.

issue_summary: Home Internet - Fixed Wireless Prioritization: 5G Home users being dropped t...
issue_description: Customer reported: Fixed Wireless Prioritization: 5G Home users being dropped to <1Mbps during peak hours while mobile users stay at 300Mbps.. Category: Home Internet. Investigation revealed tower congestion.
resolution: Res.: Move Gateway to a tower with "Lower Utilization"; check for "Sector Congestion" via a Network Repair Bureau (NRB) ticket.

issue_summary: Home Internet - Gateway "Red Blinking" Heat-Throttling: Unit loses signal en...
issue_description: Customer reported: Gateway "Red Blinking" Heat-Throttling: Unit loses signal entirely when internal temp exceeds 105Â°F.. Category: Home Internet. Investigation revealed hardware failure.
resolution: Res.: Relocate gateway away from windows; use an external USB fan for active cooling; check for firmware update for thermal management.

issue_summary: Billing/Promos - Loyalty Discount Wipe (Sept 2025): Sudden removal of $20â$40...
issue_description: Customer reported: Loyalty Discount Wipe (Sept 2025): Sudden removal of $20â$40 monthly discounts without plan changes.. Category: Billing/Promos. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Res.: "Retention Team" manual override; verify if the discount was "Limited Time" vs "Lifetime" in original contract notes.

issue_summary: Billing/Promos - Tablet Plan Price Hike: Unexpected $5/line increase on "Pric...
issue_description: Customer reported: Tablet Plan Price Hike: Unexpected $5/line increase on "Price Protected" tablet and smartwatch lines.. Category: Billing/Promos. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Res.: Filing a "Notice of Dispute"; agents can sometimes apply a 12-month credit to offset the increase if the user is on a legacy 3-year lock.

issue_summary: Billing/Promos - Trade-in "Warehouse Ghosting": UPS shows delivery to TX/TN w...
issue_description: Customer reported: Trade-in "Warehouse Ghosting": UPS shows delivery to TX/TN warehouse, but VZ status says "Waiting for Device.". Category: Billing/Promos. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Res.: Manual "Warehouse Research" ticket; requires the UPS Tracking Number and IMEI to prove delivery and force credit application.

issue_summary: Digital/App - "One Verizon ID" Sync Error: Customers with Fios and Wireles...
issue_description: Customer reported: "One Verizon ID" Sync Error: Customers with Fios and Wireless cannot see their mobile bill on the Fios portal.. Category: Digital/App. Investigation revealed cache corruption.
resolution: Res.: Clear browser cache; "Unlink" and "Relink" the accounts under a new primary email address to force a fresh database sync.

issue_summary: Digital/App - 2FA "SMS Loop" Failure: Security codes for login never arriv...
issue_description: Customer reported: 2FA "SMS Loop" Failure: Security codes for login never arrive, locking the user out of the My Verizon app.. Category: Digital/App. Investigation revealed hardware failure.
resolution: Res.: Whitelist short-code 225-999; Tech support must "Re-sync SMS Gateway" for the primary account holder's line.

issue_summary: IoT/Wearables - NumberShare "Vibration Sync" Bug: Watch rings but doesn't vi...
issue_description: Customer reported: NumberShare "Vibration Sync" Bug: Watch rings but doesn't vibrate for calls when paired with a Verizon line.. Category: IoT/Wearables. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Res.: Reset "Cellular Plan" on Apple Watch/Galaxy Watch; ensure "Standalone" mode is not accidentally toggled in the VZW back-end.

issue_summary: Customer Care - The "Tier 1 Loop": Chat bots and entry-level reps refusing t...
issue_description: Customer reported: The "Tier 1 Loop": Chat bots and entry-level reps refusing to escalate complex network issues to Tier 2.. Category: Customer Care. Investigation revealed configuration error.
resolution: Res.: Request a "Technical Supervisor"; use the keyword "NRB Ticket" or "Field Technician Dispatch" to bypass the standard script.

issue_summary: Security/Misc - eSIM "SIM Swap" Fraud Alerts: False positive security alerts...
issue_description: Customer reported: eSIM "SIM Swap" Fraud Alerts: False positive security alerts triggering account locks and line suspensions.. Category: Security/Misc. Investigation revealed esim provisioning issue.
resolution: Res.: Identity verification via in-store government ID; Fraud Department must "Clear the Security Flag" to restore automated provisioning.

issue_summary: 5G Infrastructure - C-Band Handover Jitter: High latency when switching between 5G Nationw...
issue_description: Infrastructure issue reported: C-Band Handover Jitter: High latency when switching between 5G Nationwide and 5G Ultra Wideband.. Category: 5G Infrastructure. Root cause: tower congestion.
resolution: Res.: Network engineers must perform a "Site Reset" on the specific sector; user can toggle "5G On" instead of "5G Auto" to force stability.

issue_description: Infrastructure issue reported: Standalone (SA) Modem Lock: Phones refusing to latch onto the newer 5G Standalone core, resulting in slower "Non-Standalone" speeds.. Category: 5G Infrastructure. Root cause: software bug.
resolution: Res.: Update to the latest OS-level carrier bundle (e.g., VZW 58.0+); requires back-end "Feature Add" for 5G SA on the line profile.

resolution: Res.: Replace coax splitters with 1675MHz-rated units; ensure MoCA Privacy is disabled on the primary router if using 3rd party extenders.

resolution: Res.: Technical support must "Break the Lease" manually; ONT hardware replacement required if the "Data" light remains off after reboot.
